Header: Anjaline Gunathilaka bids adieu to the nation
Content: Veteran vocalist Anjaline Gunthilaka who enthralled Sri Lankan music lovers for more than six decades bade adieu to the nation today. Anjaline Gunathilaka who had earned a household name in playback music in Cinema, passed away recently at the age of 79 years old. She entered to playback music in 1958 contributing to the ‘Sohoyuro’ movie. She has sung hundreds of songs during her career. The last rites were held at the Borella cemetery this afternoon. A large number of artistes in Sri Lanka attended the funeral.
